attrs.description: Dataset from 2016 to 2023, resolution n320. Operational data, deterministic. See https://apps.ecmwf.int/mars-catalogue/?stream=oper&levtype=sfc&expver=1&month=jan&year=2024&type=an&class=od
Dataset containing land surface and cloud variables from IFS Operations for investigation of adding surface variables to the AIFS on n320 grid ready for training operational model
